snippet: Chinese state news outlets were reporting filthy conditions and an unorthodox diet for Jin Yi, a 7-year-old female giant panda who died at the Zhengzhou city zoo, but a zoo official denied any connection.
abstract: Chinese state news outlets were reporting filthy conditions and an unorthodox diet for Jin Yi, a 7-year-old female giant panda who died at the Zhengzhou city zoo, but a zoo official denied any connection.

headline.main: A Panda's Death Raises Questions About Its Treatment
